DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the study is to evaluate whether sitagliptin can affect postprandial lipoprotein metabolism in type 2 diabetic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Sitagliptin on Postprandial Lipoprotein Metabolism
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes dietary therapy lipidlowering therapy antihyperglycemic drug therapy
